data.message: I absolutely hate that my news feed defaults to top stories. Really Facebook, I dislike that I miss things from friends and family members because you feel like I should have Tasty instead of a pictures of first Halloween costumes or pregnancy announcements. Please PLEASE allow me to set 'most recent' as my default rather than top stories. I am perfectly capable of deciding what should be on my news feed, I don't need you to dictate that.

replies.message: We appreciate your feedback, Emily. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve Facebook for everyone. Let us know what would make Facebook more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2fMQJfM. -Joe
Facebook I just did. Let me chose what should show up on my newsfeed. I don't need you to dictate that.
I can't agree with you more.
i dont like this new page dont why why you changed it weres the games as well
Facebook I completely agree with Emily.

Facebook  you say you are working to improve FB for 'everyone'.. no, you are not... you are making it good for your advertisers and not letting our friends see what we want them to see...  also, get the half naked big boobed sponsored ads off my page.. PLEASE, little kids are seeing this... and the exaggerated distorted faces....  makes me sick.
mark zuckerberg can u veryfied my fb page
Or also videos you may like , how stupid! I'll decide on what videos i like and add people i know
I agree that the default should not be "Top Stories" - I too prefer to see the most recent posts.

Hi Dia. Thanks for the input. Can you give us a little more information? Here's our feedback form where you can give suggestions to help us improve the overall experience for Facebook users: http://bit.ly/2eAHLwt. -Nick
Facebook I am just thankful that you gave us Facebook.
Facebook Your "TRENDING" is so biased it is laughable.
Facebook, here's another feature you could just make a settings option so people that like reading their newsfeed showing top stories can and those of us who like most recent can.

Facebook still waiting fo an answer about how to stay in touch with people when you take away the mobile site. as i mentioned, i have a company owned phone, which means i am not allowed to install external apps on it. which means you are taking away my only way to message on facebook.
